articles.author: Tim Lister, CNN
articles.title: What is COVAX? The world's best hope for getting everyone vaccinated, explained
articles.description: It's called COVAX -- and it may be the best hope in vaccinating the world. The relative obscurity of this vaccine program belies its critical role in the global battle against Covid-19. Indeed, COVAX may well be the most important acronym of 2021.
